name: lumos-os
description: LumOS - Universal Polyglot Operating System with Lumos Language Integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:lumos"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:lumos
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/lumos-engine && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/target backend/lumos-engine/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:render: cd backend && git push render main

author: Hirotoshi Uchida
